import React, { memo } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useCartSummary } from '../context/CartContext'; const Header = memo(() => { const { cartSummary } = useCartSummary(); return (
{/* Logo */}
styli ستايلي
{/* Main Navigation */}
  • WOMEN
  • MEN
  • KIDS
  • BEAUTY
  • HOME
{/* Search Bar */}
{/* User Icons */}
{cartSummary.itemCount > 0 && ( {cartSummary.itemCount} )}
); }); export default Header;
